text: I Wanna Be with You is a 2000 studio album from musician Mandy Moore. The album contains several new songs and a few remixes from her first album. I Wanna Be with You sold over 805,000 copies in the United States. The album's title song was Moore's only Top 40 song. ==References== Category:Pop albums Category:2000 albums
title: I Wanna Be with You (album)
